pages.text: 98|8|Podosi eson nazdi Parvardigorason ʙoƣhoi [ʙihisti] covidon ast, ki cujʙorho az zeri [daraxtoni] on corist; hamesa dar on xohand mond; Alloh taolo az [a'moli] onho xusnud ast va onon [niz] az [podosi] U xusnudand; va in [maqom va podos] ʙaroi kasest, ki az Parvardigoras ʙitarsad
99|1|Hangome ki zamin ʙo sadidtarin takonhojas ʙa larza darojad
99|4|Dar on ruz [zamin] tamomi xaʙarhojasro ʙozgu mekunad
99|5|Zero Parvardigorat ʙa u [cunin] vahj [va hukm] kardaast
99|6|Dar on ruz mardum guruh-guruh ʙozmegardand, to [naticai] a'molason ʙa onon nison doda savad
99|7|Pas, har kas ʙa andozai zarrae kori nek ancom doda ʙosad, [podosi] onro meʙinad
99|8|Va har kas ʙa andozai zarrae kori ʙad karda ʙosad, [kajfari] onro meʙinad
100|1|Savgand ʙa asphoi davanda, ki nafaszanon [ʙa suji majdoni cihod] pes meraftand
100|2|Va savgand ʙa asphoe, ki [ʙo ʙarxurdi sumhojason ʙa sangho] sarorai [otas] ecod kardand
100|3|Boz savgand ʙa asphoe, ki dar suʙhgohon [ʙar dusman] juris ʙarand
100|4|Pas, dar on hangom gardu ƣuʙor ʙarangezand
100|6|Jaqinan, inson dar ʙaroʙari [ne'mathoi] Parvardigoras ʙisjor nosipos ast
100|7|Va ʙe gumon, u ʙar in [nosiposi] guvoh ast
100|8|Va hamono u aloqai farovone ʙa mol [-i dunjo] dorad
100|9|Ojo u namedonad, ki dar on ruz on ci dar gurhost, [hama zinda va] ʙarangexta savand
